item.description:
Please come to the Talisman New Age Store in
Monroe to learn how Global Events are tied into
2012 forecasts.

Please let me know if you want to arraign for car
Pooling there.

A.

http://www.sgra.org/c...

www.sgra.org/calendar/view_entry.php?id=29&date=20090321

B.

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/new/


Like all Meet Ups, if there is snowy and/or icy weather then
I will cancel this Meet Up.

C.

http://www.talismanct...

www.talismanct.com/

Please note that I think that a lot of these Global Events,
Such as the so called “Global Warming” or “Climate Change”, is related to
Space Weather such as Sun and other solar system activities.
I will not know until March 21st if this belief will be discussed during
This workshop.

D.

http://en.wikipedia.o...

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012

E.

http://www.2012endofd...

www.2012endofdays.org/general/Predictions-for-2012.php

F.

http://en.wikipedia.o...

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maya_calendar
item.how_to_find_us: Enough people there know me to point me out.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone Learns about 2012 and Potential Global Events on 3/21
